snippet: The Cubs’ president of baseball operations won the day over the Red Sox, which he led as general manager for nearly a decade. The Cubs hired Epstein, who is originally from Boston, in October.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Chicago Cubs defeat the Boston Red Sox, 3-0; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Cubs’ president of baseball operations won the day over the Red Sox, which he led as general manager for nearly a decade. The Cubs hired Epstein, who is originally from Boston, in October.

headline.seo: Epstein’s Cubs Beat His Former Red Sox
headline.main: Epstein’s New Team Beats His Old One
headline.print_headline: Epstein’s Reflective Before Win Over Red Sox
